biotools.summary: U-Infuse is a free, open-source software application allowing custom training of deep learning object detectors, without technical expertise within a user-friendly GUI. It democratizes AI by allowing users to annotate data, train and deploy object detectors on custom datasets using their own device.

bioschemas.name: U-Infuse
